image.altText: Fatima Payman announces decision to quit Labor Party

Fatima Payman's split with Labor happened slowly, then suddenly. Her move has angered former colleagues, but her loss will be felt heavily.

image.altText: Brent Wyndham in police uniform walking in the middle of a group of police officers.

props.synopsis: Giving evidence on the fourth day of a coronial inquest into the death of an Indigenous woman in WA's Mid West, Senior Constable Brent Wyndham says everything he did on the night she died "was right".

title.children: Police officer who fatally shot Indigenous woman rejects assertions he breached police policy four times, inquest hears

image.altText: A young student raises his hand in a classroom setting.

image.altText: Children present in an allegedly stolen car in Kalgoorlie are reunited with their parents.

image.altText: A footballer on the field holding a bandage against his arm

image.altText: The bomb blast scene in Kuta several days after the bomb blasts.

image.altText: woman with bandaged face and tube in her mouth

image.altText: A woman is sitting down and crying while people try to comfort her.

image.altText: A man leans to work on a large server, standing in an aisle of servers with cables running everywhere.

image.altText: Black and white photo of tobacco grading at Manjimup, 1952.

image.altText: A woman stands with three people in front of a helicopter - two are in police and paramedic uniforms.

image.altText: A streak of light across the night sky over a busy street.

image.altText: A swampy shallow creek with trees around.

image.altText: A lake which has iced over. The sun shines brightly overhead.

image.altText: A girl sits on the floor hunched in a corner next to a cupboard, peering over her knees.

image.altText: Michael Ross Tyler in a selfie with a cowboy hat on

image.altText: A young woman wearing grey dress over black skivvy stands in front of a house, smiling with a mug in her hands

title.children: Got an old, cold house like Laine's? Here are seven ways to make it warmer and cheaper

image.altText: Two teenage boys sit on the couch, using mobile phones.

image.altText: Derelict terrace houses covered in graffiti.

image.altText: Donnell Wallam

image.altText: Amir Maimon looks down on the Press Club stage.

image.altText: An aerial shot shows a large complex of buildings with red roofs, including a palace, with a bay in the background.
